so… does that mean it has an alimentary canal or a gastrovascular cavity?

Alimentary canal: meaning food moves in one direction from mouth to anus. (ex. Humans)

Gastrovascular cavity: meaning animal has one opening for food and waste to move in and out of. (ex. sea anemone)

I’m finishing Bio II and there’s so many organisms that break their own rulebooks. It’s frustrating and fascinating at the same time!

Example: Bacteria is generally invisible to the naked eye. but there’s one that’s threadlike and long enough to be measurable in centimeters

Example: all animals are heterotrophs (they eat food for energy) and all plants are autotrophs (they MAKE food for energy) but there’s a sea slug called the leaf sheep whose OWN CELLS are photosynthetic.

And don’t get me started on fungi. The best working example my bio professor gave my class is “a eukaryote that’s NOT a protist, NOT an animal, and NOT a plant” literally what IS A FUNGI???!)

some are ducking deadly. some you can be allergic to if you eat it bc it’s got DNA that’s more similar to HUMANS than plants. (they’re actually in the same phylum as all animals, not plants)
and some make life-saving medicines or delicious pizza toppings.

I love turning idiots into comb jellyfish.

Evolution vs food.

Food disproves evolution.
Every organism no matter how small either manufacturers or collects food or it would die very quickly.

Every organism identifies, ingests, digests, filters, stores, and excretes food.

It has to identify the difference between food or rock.

It must ingests food through a specialized opening designed to intake only food and nothing else.

The food itself is useless until it is digested, a complex multi-stage process all by itself.

If it cannot store the energy from the digested food at least temporarily it would die.

Then it must filter the waste products or die from internal toxicity.

And then excrete the waste products through an orifice specifically designed to excrete the waist and only the waist, the precious blood or cytoplasm must remain inside the body.

An Evolutionist wants you to believe that a life-form came together in the beginning with all of these features in place with no help and no previous steps for natural selection... this would be the equivalent of a car capable of making another car inside of itself... because if it cannot reproduce it would be forever alone and die old age.

God created life.
